channel.title: Division by zero
channel.description: I've tried several things to get a FPS view. I am very close, but now I approach this.. whenever my camera thingy hits the character model, normally you would just see through the character I think.. but I get freezed. and get a / by zero error.

item.title: Division by zero
item.dc:creator: @Mario_PvP Mario PvP
item.description:
@Mario_PvP wrote:

I’ve tried several things to get a FPS view. I am very close, but now I approach this… whenever my camera thingy hits the character model, normally you would just see through the character I think… but I get freezed. and get a / by zero error.

Read full topic
